TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CollectionEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

summary.span: 提供一个用户界面，该界面可以在设计时编辑大多数类型的集合。

span.span: Provides a user interface that can edit most types of collections at design time.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用将 与属性关联。The following code example uses an to associate the with a property. [!code-cpp[EditorAttributesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EditorAttributesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EditorAttributesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

para.span: 此编辑器可以编辑具有属性的集合 。

span.span: This editor can edit collections that have an property.

para.span: 如果该属性存在，则编辑器可以确定该集合的类型 。

span.span: The editor can determine the type of the collection from the property, if it exists.

para.span: 如果集合不具有此属性，或如果你要提供多个类型的集合，则可以重写此类的某些受保护成员，以自定义编辑器以支持其他类型的集合。

span.span: If the collection does not have this property, or if you want to provide collections of more than one type, you can override certain protected members of this class to customize the editor to support other types of collections.

summary.span: 取消对集合的更改。

span.span: Override this method if you need to perform additional processing when changes to the collection are canceled.

summary.span: 指示是否可以移除集合的初始成员。

span.span: Indicates whether original members of the collection can be removed.

returns.span: 如果允许从集合中移除此值，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if it is permissible to remove this value from the collection; otherwise, .
The default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生类中实现时，此方法指示是否可以从集合中移除指定的值。When implemented in a derived class, this method indicates whether the specified value can be removed from the collection. 默认情况下，此方法总是返回 `true` 。By default, this method always returns `true`. 当用户尝试删除作为集合原始成员的项时，将调用此方法。This method is called when the user tries to remove an item that is an original member of the collection. 删除当前编辑会话中添加的项时不会调用此方法，因为这些项尚未包含在集合中。This method is not called when removing items that were added in the current editing session because they are not yet part of the collection.

span.span: if it multiple collection members can be selected at the same time; otherwise, .
By default, this returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法指示是否可以在 "集合编辑器" 对话框中选择多个集合成员。This method indicates whether multiple collection members can be selected within the collection editor dialog box.

para.span: 您可以从继承 ，以提供您自己的窗体。

protected: virtual Type ^ CreateCollectionItemType();

summary.span: 获取此集合包含的数据类型。

span.span: Gets the data type that this collection contains.

returns.span: 集合中项的数据类型，如果对于该集合未找到 属性，则为 。

span.span: The data type of the items in the collection, or an if no property can be located on the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以从属性检索集合项的数据类型 ，此方法比此方法更快。You can retrieve the data type of the items of the collection from the property, which is faster than this method. 此方法不需要由用户调用，除非在派生类中已重写并实现此方法。This method does not need to be called by users, except in derived classes where this method has been overridden and implemented. 此方法的默认实现将返回集合的属性的数据类型 `Item` （如果存在）。The default implementation of this method returns the data type of the `Item` property of the collection, if it exists.

para.span: 开发人员可以选择重写此方法，以支持不遵循典型和受支持的集合模型的集合，或者在性能至关重要时，基于反射的类型解析速度太慢。

span.span: Developers can choose to override this method to support collections that do not follow the typical and supported collection model, or when performance is critical, and reflection-based type resolution is too slow.

A new instance of the specified object.

para.span: 如果此方法无法创建指定类型的新实例，则此方法应引发异常。

span.span: This method should throw an exception if it cannot create a new instance of the specified type.

span.span: Gets the data types that this collection editor can contain.

returns.span: 此集合可包含的数据类型数组。

span.span: An array of data types that this collection can contain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以从属性检索集合项的数据类型 ，此方法比此方法更快。You can retrieve the data type of the items of the collection from the property, which is faster than this method. 此方法不需要由用户调用，除非在派生类中已重写并实现此方法。This method does not need to be called by users, except in derived classes where this method has been overridden and implemented. 此方法的默认实现返回类型数组中所有收集项的类型。The default implementation of this method returns the type of all the collection items in a Type array.

para.span: 必须重写此方法，以支持具有多个类型的集合。

span.span: This method must be overridden to support collections with multiple types.

para.span: 此方法的默认实现将返回集合的属性的数据类型 （如果存在）。

span.span: The default implementation of this method returns the data type of the property of the collection, if it exists.

para.span: 使用此方法可重写默认实现。

span.span: Use this method to override the default implementation.

summary.span: 在用户按下编辑器对话框中的“帮助”按钮或 F1 键时，获取“帮助”关键字以显示“帮助”主题或主题列表。

span.span: The Help keyword to display the Help topic or topic list for when Help is requested from the editor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此属性以显示其他帮助主题。Override this property to display a different Help topic.

span.span: Gets the available types of items that can be created for this collection.
The types of items that can be created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示可添加到集合中的数据类型。This property indicates the data types that can be added to the collection. 默认情况下，此方法将返回一种类型的 。By default, this returns a single type of . 如果返回多个类型，集合编辑器 UI 会提供一种方法来选择要创建的项类型。If more than one type is returned, the collection editor UI provides a way to choose which item type to create.

summary.span: 将指定数组设置为集合项。

span.span: Sets the specified array as the items of the collection.

span.span: The newly created collection object or, otherwise, the collection indicated by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置要求创建新的对象，则返回新的对象。If setting requires that a new object be created, the new object is returned. 否则，将 `editValue` 返回参数。Otherwise, the `editValue` parameter is returned.
